title: Hanging Heads #2 (Blue Andrew with Plug/White Julie, Mouth Closed)
dimensions: Two heads 10 3/4 x 9 1/2 x 7 3/4" (27.3 x 24.2 x 19.7 cm) and 10 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 7 1/4" (26.7 x 22.2 x 18.4 cm), suspended approximately 72 3/4" (185 cm) above the floor
credits: Acquisition from the Werner Dannheisser Testamentary Trust
